function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Contamination of air conditioning ducts with dust and mold due to environmental conditions","Impact":"Reduced air quality, increased risk of spreading contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Regular cleaning and maintenance of air conditioning ducts, use of air filters, and monitoring of environmental conditions","Technologies":"Air purification systems, HEPA filters, UV-C germicidal lamps","People":"Building occupants, maintenance staff","Owner":"Facility management, building owners"},{"Description":"Electrical breakdowns caused by high humidity and condensation affecting fluorescent lamps","Impact":"Damage to UV-C system, electrical short circuits in HVAC system, operational downtime","Mitigation":"Use of protective tubes made of quartz glass, implementation of IP 55 or higher protection, regular inspection and maintenance","Technologies":"Quartz glass protective tubes, IP-rated enclosures, HVAC system monitoring","People":"Maintenance staff, electrical engineers","Owner":"Facility management, maintenance department"},{"Description":"Inefficient operation of UV-C system in the event of air flow stoppage","Impact":"Reduced disinfection effectiveness, potential for spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Integration of air flow sensors with UV-C system, automatic shut-off or output reduction when air flow stops","Technologies":"Air flow sensors, UV-C system controllers with automatic shut-off","People":"Maintenance staff, HVAC system technicians","Owner":"Facility management, building owners"}]}
